mapper.select: delete from INSBInsuresupplyparam where taskid = #{taskid} and inscomcode = #{inscomcode}

update INSBInsuresupplyparam set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),itemcode = #{itemcode},itemname = #{itemname},itemvalue = #{itemvalue},iteminputtype = #{iteminputtype},itemoptionallist = #{itemoptionallist},itemorder = #{itemorder} where id = #{id}
